messages.subject: Re: "Education-ese"
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I don t know where you are in WA but there is Family Learning Organization, they offer Parent-administered Assessments. They also have numbers for you to
messages.messageBody:
Hi,
I don't know where you are in WA but there is Family Learning
Organization, they offer Parent-administered Assessments. They also have
numbers for you to call if you have questions. Really friendly everytime
I called when I was pulling my kids out and paranoid I'd do something
wrong! lol

They are primarily about Natural Learning from what I can tell. Here is
a link, maybe it will help. :)

Family Learning Organization/Testing
<http://www.familylearning.org/testing.html>

~Wendy :)
